# **Request**

Get the information of all compounds in KEGG (https://www.genome.jp/kegg/compound/).

```{r,eval=FALSE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=TRUE, cache=TRUE}
library(massdatabase)
compound_info <- 
  request_kegg_compound_info()
head(compound_info)
```
